pages.heading: Archer's Polish
pages.text: Increases the velocity of fired arrows by 50%. This also increases the damage dealt by your arrows proportionally. Also stacks with Vanilla enchantments. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Sniping I (256 shots)

pages.heading: Archer's Polish L
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Sniping I (1024 shots)

pages.heading: Archer's Polish II
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the velocity by 100% instead. $(br2)Applies: Sniping II (256 shots)

pages.heading: Archer's Polish XL
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts sixteen times longer. $(br2)Applies: Sniping I (4096 shots)

pages.heading: Archer's Polish III
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the velocity by 150% instead. $(br2)Applies: Sniping III (256 shots)
